translation: Bh chuhs nh tihnz ʿbadt kran yimn tohụ̄ pvuza chihv kran.
Th nah chihv tohụ̄ tmụ̄ snz ʿbadt krn vạlụ̄ yymụ̄ snz bh ʿbadt chuhs kran.
Th nah chuhs bh (āyndh zanhh) tihnz ʿbadt krn vvl yhinz tohụ̄ pvuza chihv kran.
Th nah chihv tohụ̄ tmụ̄ snz ʿbadt krn vạlụ̄ yymụ̄ snz ʿbadt bh chuhs kran.
(lhādha) chuh tuhund dyin tuhndi khạṭr th myvn dyin myanhi khạṭr.
